## TextBufferCreationParameters interface

Optional parameters passed on \[\[TextCanvas\]\].`createTextBufferObject` function call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextBufferCreationParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [letterCaseArray](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.lettercasearray.md) | boolean\[\] | Array containing info on whether the glyphs are upper or lower case. Needed to support <code>SmallCaps</code>. |
|  [outputBounds](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.outputbounds.md) | boolean | Output text bounding-box. |
|  [outputCharacterBounds](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.outputcharacterbounds.md) | boolean | Output per-character bounds. |
|  [path](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.path.md) | THREE.Path \| THREE.CurvePath&lt;THREE.Vector2&gt; | Path where text should be placed on. Overrides the original position parameter. |
|  [pathOverflow](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.pathoverflow.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, text on a path will be placed even when its size its bigger than the path's size. |
|  [storeStyles](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.storestyles.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, both the \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] and \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] used to generate the \[\[TextBufferObject\]\] will be stored in it. |
